attributes.action: BAN ALL ELDERY PEOPLE OWNNIG YORKSHIRE TERRIERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I WISH THAT THE PRIME MINISTER WOULD BAN ALL ELDERLY PEOPLE FROM OWNING YORKSHIRE TERRIERS , PARTICULARLY THOSE WHO OWN A MOBILITY SCOOTERS

rejection.details: Please resubmit without using BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
